document.title: Information relative to a stack element

paragraph.heading: 1Information relative to a stack element
paragraph.paragraph:
In addition to the
10_call_stack_tool.xml call stack tool that provides information concerning the call stack in its globality, some other debug tools give information concerning the
10_call_stack_tool.xml current call stack element .

The
../40_object_tool/05_local_view.xml left part of the object tool gives valuable information concerning parameters that were passed to the feature corresponding to the current call stack, the current value of the local variables, and, if it is a function, the current value of its result.
